citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30-12:00
on 11-Sep-17.
Arrived at facility to find no responsible adult available. No cell signal is available in this area. Returned 2 hours
later to still find no responsible adult available.
